title: WATCH: Why are so many Egyptian statues missing their nose?
text:

Is it just a coincidence, or could it possibly be a conspiracy?

When travelling through Egypt's iconic ancient historical sites, you might have noticed that a certain appendage seems to be missing from most statues - even murals.

The nose is even famously missing from the most iconic of them all - the Sphinx!

Whatch the video to find out why.
